column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Toyota V8 (Hilux?) crashed into a road divider at 12:30 am on May 28
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to witnesses at the scene
column10: was driven by a man suspected of being drunk along Monivong Road in a southbound direction.------After the incident
